headline: Top Stock Movers Now: Constellation Brands, Block, PepsiCo, and More
summary: U.S. equities dropped at midday after a federal appeals court ruled against President Donald Trump's tariff policy, putting the future of the duties in question.

headline: Affirm Rival Klarna To Launch IPO Amid Fierce Buy Now, Pay Later Battle
summary: Klarna, a BNPL rival of Affirm, aims to raise up to $1.27 billion in its IPO. Affirm stock has advanced 41% in 2025.

headline: KBW Highlights Upside Potential for Block (XYZ) Across Its Business Segments
summary: Block Inc. (NYSE:XYZ) ranks among the best software stocks to buy right now. On August 22, Keefe, Bruyette & Woods reaffirmed its Outperform rating and $95 price target for Block Inc. (NYSE:XYZ). The firm expressed confidence in Block’s development trajectory for the rest of the year, citing an expected growth uptick in both of the […]
